Pre-Game Insights: The match is significant as it could take India to new territory in World Cup qualifiers.
Sunil Chhetri's final game for India adds prestige to the match.
Coach Igor Stimac emphasizes the importance of victory over Kuwait.
Kuwait's preparation includes a one-week camp in Thailand and expectations to improve from past performances.
Historical Context: India and Kuwait have met three times in the past year, with India winning once in the World Cup qualifiers.
Significance of the Match: The match is a crucial do-or-die situation for India after a recent defeat to Afghanistan.
Chhetri's retirement adds emotional weight to the game.
Coaches' Strategies: Coach Stimac focuses on defensive discipline and scoring goals from open play.
Kuwait's coach Rui Bento highlights the team's readiness and confidence for the match.
